description:
Shark tries to stop Kite from stealing Yuma’s Golden Key by challenging him to a duel!  Can Shark sink his teeth into Kite’s life points and save Yuma’s prized possession, or will Kite’s cunning skills sink any chance Shark has of winning?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Emperor`s Key Stolen! Kaito vs Shark
Ubawareta Sumeragi no Kagi! Gekitotsu Kaito vs Shark
奪われた皇の鍵! 激突カイトvsシャーク
